thread.title: Olivia Wilde's cute photo with baby daughter has people 'laughing out loud' - can you see why?
thread.title_full: Olivia Wilde's cute photo with baby daughter has people 'laughing out loud' - can you see why?

author: Zahra Mulroy
title: Olivia Wilde's cute photo with baby daughter has people 'laughing out loud' - can you see why?
text:
Actors Olivia Wilde and Jason Sudeikis welcomed their daughter into the world in October (Photo: Jamie McCarthy/2015 FilmMagic) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Thank goodness for Instagram, giving us tantalising and furiously curated 'glimpses' into the lives of the rich and famous. 
Actress and activist Olivia Wilde is a huge Insta-fave. 
With 2.3 million followers (not to be sniffed at), the Love the Coopers star frequently demonstrates a sense of humour about acting, politics - and motherhood. 
A recent photo of Olivia posted of her cradling baby daughter, Daisy Josephine Sudeikis , has delighted her many fans. 
Aside from being very sweet, it also inadvertently contains a hilarious optical illusion. Do you see it? Olivia Wilde and her daughter 
With her right hand wrapped around Daisy, and Daisy's own hand hidden in her bodysuit, it does look like a case of Giant Baby Hand. 
One fan commented: "This actually made me laugh out loud. The look on the babyâ€™s face makes it even better." Still pregnant at the Toronto International Film Festival (Photo: Splash News) 
That said, not everyone spotted it straight away. 
Another fan admitted: "Embarrassingly took me a long time to figure out where that giant baby hand came from!" 
Giant hand or no, it is still an incredibly sweet photo. Like us on Facebook
